member.name: EMREXTSELECTCLIPRGN
member.summary: The EMREXTSELECTCLIPRGN structure contains members for the enhanced metafile record.

member.name: EMREXTSELECTCLIPRGN.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMREXTSELECTCLIPRGN.cbRgnData
member.summary: Size of region data, in bytes.

member.name: EMREXTSELECTCLIPRGN.iMode
member.summary: Operation to be performed. This member must be one of the following values: RGN_AND, RGN_COPY, RGN_DIFF, RGN_OR, or RGN_XOR.
